column4: Does anyone know where I can find the source code for dumpe2fs?
if the deb is in the repos, you will find the source there also (maybe you have to enable the src repo)
all I can find is e2fslibs-dev which is not what I want, right?
enable src in repos (add to end of line) sudo apt-get update  and then you will find the source-code (imo)
